thread.title: CA Marine Warning and Forecast

author: Accuweather
title: CA Marine Warning and Forecast
text:
CA Marine Warnings and Forecast for Sunday, November 16, 2025
SPECIAL MARINE WARNING
The National Weather Service in San Francisco has issued a
* Special Marine Warning for...
Coastal Waters from Point Reyes to Pigeon Point California out to
10 NM...
* Until 1115 PM PST.
* At 1047 PM PST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing
waterspouts was located 8 NM north of Farallon Islands, moving
northeast at 40 knots.
HAZARD...Waterspouts and wind gusts to 34 knots.
SOURCE...Radar indicated.
IMPACT...Waterspouts can easily overturn boats and create
locally hazardous seas. Small craft could be damaged
in briefly higher winds and suddenly higher waves.
* Locations impacted include...
Mainly open waters of Coastal Waters from Point Reyes to Pigeon
Point California out to 10 NM.
PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...
Move to safe harbor until hazardous weather passes.
